title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 80-year-old grandmother becomes oldest woman to finish the Ironman World Championship
items.description: Just 20 years ago, Natalie Grabow was learning to swim. Now she's hailed as an inspiration after winning her age group at the famously grueling triath...

items.title: The Small Company in Europe Caught in the Big Trade War Between the U.S. and China
items.description: Nexperia, a computer chip maker headquartered in the Netherlands, was taken over by the Dutch government after pressure from officials in Washington.

items.title: FEMA Cuts Disaster Spending, Leaving States Fending for Themselves
items.description: President Trump has said he wants to eventually shift the burden of disaster relief and recovery onto states. It’s already happening.

items.title: Vatican Panel Says Church Is Still Too Slow in Addressing Sexual Abuse
items.description: The commission’s report highlights the difficulties Pope Leo faces in trying to end clerical abuses and ensure abusers are held to account.

items.title: Some of the things Gaza needs: A government, security and tools to rebuild
items.description: A shaky ceasefire is holding. Now the Palestinian territory is in urgent need of a functioning government, order on the streets, and resources to star...

items.title: Health insurance premiums are going up next year — unless you work at these companies
items.description: As U.S. health insurance costs rise, some companies are paying for all of their workers' premiums. It's a big expense — but they say it pays off.

items.title: India Tiptoes Around Trump’s Latest Claims on Russian Oil Purchases

items.title: Targets of Trump's Justice Department must pay up, even if they win
items.description: For defendants facing criminal charges from the Justice Department, the costs of fighting are enormous and can reverberate for years, according to vet...

items.title: Israel Marks Two Years Since Oct. 7 as a Fragile Cease-Fire in Gaza Holds
items.description: Ceremonies took place on Thursday to commemorate two years since the surprise attack on southern Israel, according to the Jewish calendar.

items.title: Trump escalates pressure on Venezuelan drug trade. And, judge pauses shutdown layoffs
items.description: Trump escalates pressure on Venezuela by authorizing covert CIA operations. And, a federal judge halts the Trump administration's shutdown layoffs.
